targets.query:
from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] == "outdoor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] == "outdoor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] == "indoor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] == "indoor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] == "office")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] == "office")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")

from(bucket: "power")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "solar_generation")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "power")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "home_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "power")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_charge_percentage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "power")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_flow")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "power")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "grid_flow")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "power")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "solar_generation")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "power")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "home_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "power")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "grid_flow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] == "outdoor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] == "indoor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] == "outdoor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "humidity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] == "indoor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "humidity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] == "office")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sensor"] == "office")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "humidity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "power")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "solar_generation" or r["_field"] == "home_usage" or r["_field"] == "battery_flow" or r["_field"] == "grid_flow" or r["_field"] == "battery_charge_percentage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "air-quality")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air-quality")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "PM1.0" or r["_field"] == "PM2.5" or r["_field"] == "PM10")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "air-quality")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air-quality")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Particles>0.3µm/0.1Lair" or r["_field"] == "Particles>0.5µm/0.1Lair" or r["_field"] == "Particles>1.0µm/0.1Lair")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "air-quality")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air-quality")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Particles>2.5µm/0.1Lair" or r["_field"] == "Particles>5.0µm/0.1Lair" or r["_field"] == "Particles>10.0µm/0.1Lair")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
